goal.en: "This course will give a series of lectures by invited speakers who are experts in communication systems, signal processing, and communication networks. In addition, students will be divided into several study groups, then read selected papers, discuss with peers, and finally report their progress and study results in oral presentation."
goal.ch: 邀請國內相關領域的專家學者（包含通訊系統、訊號處理及通訊網路三群），給予本所學生講授通訊工程之相關技術、發展及應用，提供學生專業知識和學習機會，此外，依照本所學生的研究領域和範疇，學生也將依研究分項，著實分組及匯報，藉由同儕互動和討論方式，提高學生的學習成效。
